DOC.brief_summary: Purpose of the study is to evaluate the effectiveness and safety of a new investigational dur, IC351. Study is designed to gather information regarding the possible usefulness of IC351 as a treatment of several blood vessel features of scleroderma. This includes Raynaud phenomenon as well as the vaginal dryness and discomfort associated with scleroderma
DOC.brief_title: Trial of IC351 in Female Scleroderma Patients With Raynaud's and Sexual Dysfunction
DOC.criteria: Female with diagnosis of scleroderma Stable sexual relationship with male partner or be sexually active Raynaud phenomenon at least 6 times per week Willing to attempt sexual activity 1/month during study period Severe internal organ problems related to scleroderma Other gynecologic problems Serious depression Receiving other experimental and Raynaud treatments
